column1: In one of the houses lived a wise old Hyup named Bini Aru
column2: who used to be a clever Sorcerer. But Ozma of Oz
column3: who rules everyone in the Land of Oz
column4: had made a decree that no one should practice magic in her dominions except Glinda the Good and the Wizard of Oz
column5: and when Glinda sent this royal command to the Hyups by means of a strong-winged Eagle
column6: old Bini Aru at once stopped performing magical arts. He destroyed many of his magic powders and tools of magic
column7: and afterward honestly obeyed the law. He had never seen Ozma
column8: but he knew she was his Ruler and must be obeyed.There was only one thing that grieved him. He had discovered a new and secret method of transformations that was unknown to any other Sorcerer. Glinda the Good did not know it
column9: nor did the little Wizard of Oz
column10: nor Dr. Pipt nor old Mombi
column11: nor anyone else who dealt in magic arts.
